Backup in progress Preparing for backup. Backup complete Backup succeeded at %s. Backup cancelled Backup cancelled. Backup in progress: %1$s MB / %2$s MB. Google authorization not secured Backup failed Backup failed with error message: %s. No Google API available on this device No Google account was selected, cancelling. No backup available on Google Drive. Restoration starting Restoration from Google Drive started. Restoration download complete Files from Google Drive downloaded at %s. "You're about to delete your local data and replace it with a backup from %s.\n\nThis is irrevocable. Proceed?" Restoration cancelled Restoration cancelled. Restoration failed Restoration from Google Drive failed with error %s. Would you like to logout of your Google Drive account?\nNo data will be deleted from Google Drive.
